pr_title: [Flink-20437][table-planner-blink] Move the utility methods in ExecNode into ExecNodeUtil & Port ExecNode to Java

timeline.message: [FLINK-20437][table-planner-blink] Move the utility methods in ExecNode into ExecNodeUtil

replies.bodyText: It's used for some ExecNodes to create Transformation.
